p:
The thresholds for weekly incidence rates of ILI to assess intensity of epidemic activity (baseline, low, moderate, high and very high) were obtained by the Mobile Epidemics Method (MEM)
5 from data from 12 previous influenza epidemic seasons. For the 2017–2018 season these values were: 75.84–109.40 – 244.92–440.56 and 571.09 respectively. Epidemic threshold was settled at 109.4 cases per 100,000 inhabitants.
6
